titleStmt.title: St. foine improved a discourse shewing the utility and benefit which England hath and may receive by the grasse called St. Foine and answering the objections urged against it ... / written by a person of honour lately deceased.
titleStmt.author: Person of honour lately deceased.
Pettus, John, Sir, 1613-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. G. and B. G. for Nath. Brooke ...,

notesStmt.note: Incorrectly attributed to John Pettus. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
